commentThumbQuerySQL: select count(*) as count from comment_thumb where comment_id='<%= comment_id %>'
commentThumbFlagSQL: select count(*) as count from comment_thumb where user_id='<%= user_id %>' and comment_id='<%= comment_id %>'
commentThumbSQL: insert into comment_thumb (user_id, comment_id) values('<%= user_id %>','<%= comment_id %>')
commentThumbCancelSQL: delete from comment_thumb where user_id='<%= user_id %>' and comment_id='<%= comment_id %>'
